website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the New Balance Fresh Foam Tempo has been positive. This running shoe is welcomed because of its cool-looking silhouette, as well as its relatively light construction that permits extended running sessions. Conversely, the in-shoe experience is thought to be a bit restrictive and irritating to the skin of the heel.Fans of versatile apparel for those road adventures can enjoy the Fresh Foam Tempo.
pros: Several people have noted that the aesthetics and vibrant color schemes of the New Balance Fresh Foam Tempoheighten its overall visual aspect
Some users have mentioned that this neutral running shoe has a lightweight build that encourages all-day use
Breathability is a trait that is appreciated by most consumers
Based on a handful of reviews, the gripping capability of the outsole unit is precise and agreeable
The underfoot cushioning system of this road running shoe is welcomed because it has a slightly firm yet springy ride
cons: Some testers are claiming that the in-shoe experience is restrictive
The multilayered external counter is criticized for putting pressure against the skin of the heel

customer_reviews.title: Wore out after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: The tread on the shoes is worn to almost nothing in several areas after 111.46 miles of running on pavement (2.5 months). Additionally, the inner heal on the right shoe wore down and padding shifted resulting in the reinforcing material inside of the back of the heal of the shoe to jab at the back of my heal. The material used in these shoes is not quality. They were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, a bit small. tie them like this
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, but order a half size up (for reference size 11 nike free rn 2017s fit me true to size) I ordered 11 and they were too snug around the toes, but 11.5 fits me pretty well. I pronate a bit and these feel good when running, the cushening in the mid is nice. And in the heel when walking. Also after a couple runs they started rubbing my achilles tendon, but i tied them a certain way and I haven’t had an issue since, though I only have about 30 miles on the so far.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa Gardea

customer_reviews.title: The lacing system is ridiculously stupid!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think shoes have been laced pretty simply ever since the shoelace was created/invented. However, these shoes had to figure out some ridiculous new way to lace the shoes that was completely tedious and ridiculous! I tried undoing this new lacing system and re-lacing them the way you, me, your parents and grandparents have laced their shoes--but couldn't figure it out. This was so ridiculous that I am simply returning these shoes. I actually found a pair of Swedish running shoes (Salming) that are the most simplistic, and light, that I have recently worn.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my brother who had a leg amputated below the knee from diabetes problems, well he wants to protect his only foot he has left ..well he lived them ! Said they were so comfy and cushioned , which he needed .. said best pair of tennis shoes ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting with a shoe named "Tempo". I was hoping these would be a good replacement for my NB Fresh Foam Beacon 2's for tempo/faster runs, but that won't be the case...these are a little heavy and clunky. I also own the NB FuelCell Rebel; both the Beacon 2 & Rebels are much lighter and more responsive. The fit is good and the shoes is comfortable, but they just don't have the same snappiness as the Rebel and Beacon2. They are good recovery day shoes. I purchased these here for $35...good price.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and give you good toe and heel support. They are pretty light so I don't know what some revewers described these shoes as heavy. Cushion is great specially for over 200lbs folks. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M. Lama

customer_reviews.title: Teenager came home from moms...
customer_reviews.text: With size 13 New Balances. I immediately noticed they were bigger than my shoes. Sure enough she bought the wrong size. Bought another pair (10.5 wide). Fit him perfect. Shoes are NOT meant to be grown into.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tobey

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk 4 miles every morning and only wear New balance which I generally love their shoes. I purchase a new pair about every 3 months due to the amount of miles I put on them but this pair is totally shot after a month. I noticed that they run a little smaller than the rest of New Balance but nothing to drastic. After 4 weeks of wear both heals are completely torn out and I have a blister on my right achilles. I love New Balance but avoid this model.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, It seems over the last couple of years, NB shoes are running extremely small. I have several older pairs but I’ve tried to buy them on several occasions and the sizing just isn’t right and the next size up isn’t any better
customer_reviews.author: Phil77

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. My feet are a little narrow; if you have a wide foot, you probably should consider going up a half a size. I like they style of the shoe very much. It is low enough that it does not cut into my ankle bone. I believe I'm going to enjoy these shoes for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little over one month ago and they are already wearing away inside by the heel. I have maybe put 100 miles on them, if that. Very disappointed in the quality. Will be going back to wearing Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Clint W. Cypert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality, cheap material and not fresh foam. It’s flat and no support
customer_reviews.author: Pa Vang

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned lots of New Balance shoes over the years, these fit smaller and more narrow. They don’t have a sturdy shoe feel, more like sock. I’m not happy with these and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SWS

customer_reviews.title: Great Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: As always, New Balance are basically the only manufacturer that has size 14 2E (wide) shoes. This is an excellent shoe. Light weight for running. Fabric top so your feet stay cool and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Paddleball Man

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small but good overall
customer_reviews.text: The New Balance sneakers are pretty good but my normal size was a little small. My big toe on my right foot has little room but overall it’s a nice sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing find... this is my first New Balance and will definitely get another... So far I love the fit and using it for training. MY FEET ARE Happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: versionC

customer_reviews.title: Solid tempo shoe
customer_reviews.text: A solid pair of shoes. A little flat, meaning there is no bounce back or ultra cushioning, but they handle slow and fast runs well. They also look great. Runs about 1/2 small.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Fam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 18 year old grandson. He loves the color and said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: New balance
customer_reviews.text: Great walking or running shoes i also use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: This is not the new Zante
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing the zante since the 1st generation and this is not the replacment that it is much bulkier and has less feel. Do not buy this looking for the new incarnation of the zante.
customer_reviews.author: James Trufan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like them these shoes are great for working out and running, well worth what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Purchase with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that I wore them for 8 hours the first day, they were that comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Daly

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. They are super comfortable for power walking. I highly recommend them ..
customer_reviews.author: undaunted

customer_reviews.title: Shredded shoe laces
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with how they fit until he took the left shoe out of the box and the shoe lace was already shredded. He loves the laces and now he has to go and try to find the same ones to fit in the shoes. Just not happy how the lace was ripped already.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Witosky

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Moved from the new balance Zante pursuit to this. Not too different. A little more foam underneath. Have a few hot spots but haven’t really broken them in yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advised
customer_reviews.text: You advised as W and it was 2E I needed a 4E.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shoe came a little smaller than expected but still fits ok. Comfortable but don’t get them wet because your socks will get soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Sdb141

customer_reviews.title: sickers
customer_reviews.text: for the price I paid $95.00 it feels less comfortable than snickers I paid $40.00 next time I buy I need to see a very big discount on these snickers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good short distance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable short distance shoes. Not much rebound so energy return isnt great but they are light and are my go to 5k shoe
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moran

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: the right shoe has a protrusion where the eyelet for the lace comes thru that is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: ken palmer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but 13 wide is more like 11 narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Tempo Running Shoes
